title: Denitrification returns nitrogen to the atmosphere

content.description:
Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the following processes. 
(A) Photosynthesis 
(B) Eutrophication 
(C) Denitrification 
(D) Decomposition 
(E) Transpiration
content.question: The process by which a soil nutrient is reduced and released to the atmosphere as a gas

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
